property.description: GUIX internal thread stack size in bytes. Must be greater than zero or empty.

constraint.display: Value must be greater than or zero or empty

property.description: GUIX system timer. Must be a multiple of TX_TIMER_TICKS_PER_SECOND or empty. Do not set when GUIX Timer Rate is set.

constraint.display: Value must be greater than or equal to 10 or empty

property.description: GUIX timer rate as a multiple of the ThreadX tick interrupt rate. Must be greater than zero or empty.

constraint.display: Value must be greater than or zero or empty

property.description: If your application has only one thread which utilizes the GUI API services, say yes to reduce system overhead.
GUIX disables UTF8 support if you say yes.
Size of GUIX Event Queue Size. Must be greater than zero or empty.

constraint.display: Value must be greater than or zero or empty

property.description: Priority of GUIX Internal Thread. The value must be between 0 to 31.

constraint.display: Value must be between 0 to 31, or empty

property.description: Time Slice value of GUIX Internal Thread. The value must be between 0(TX_NO_TIME_SLICE) to 0xFFFFFFFF.

constraint.display: Value must be a non-negative integer

property.display: Use User Data Field in GX_WIDGET Structure
property.description: GUIX allows users to use gx_widget_user_data member in GX_WIDGET Structure if you say yes.
Reduce the GUIX library code size and GX_DISPLAY structure size by removing support for the arc-drawing functions circle, arc, pie, and ellipse.
If your application does not require runtime decode of jpg or png files, select yes to reduce the GUIX library footprint.
If your application is using only C source code format resource files, select yes to reduce your GUIX library footprint.
This value defines how long the button waits before beginning to send repeated GX_EVENT_CLICKED events.

constraint.display: Value must be greater than zero or empty

property.display: Maximum number of unique dirty list entries
property.description: This value defines the maximum number of unique dirty list entries that can be maintained by one canvas.

constraint.display: Value must be greater than zero or empty

property.description: This value defines the maximum nesting of the drawing context stack.

constraint.display: Value must be greater than zero or empty

property.description: This value defines size of the stack used to maintain the list of widgets that have captures the user input

constraint.display: Value must be greater than zero or empty

property.description: This value defines the rate at which the input cursor blinks for text input widgets.

constraint.display: Value must be greater than zero or empty

property.description: This value defines the size of the list-start index cache maintained by the multi-line text view and multi-line text input widgets.

constraint.display: Value must be greater than zero or empty

property.display: Multi line text button maximum lines
property.description: This value determines the number of text pointers needed by the worst case multi-line text button.

constraint.display: Value must be greater than zero or empty

property.description: This value determines the most complex polygon that can be drawn by GUIX.

constraint.display: Value must be greater than zero or empty

property.display: Numeric scroll wheel string buffer size
property.description: This value determines the maximum length of the string required to display the assigned integer values.

constraint.display: Value must be greater than zero or empty

property.description: This value defines the number of GUIX timer ticks (50 ms) between updates of a circular gauge configured to animate the needle movement between last and current angular position.

constraint.display: Value must be greater than zero or empty

property.description: This value defines the size of buffer allocated to convert an integer value assigned to the prompt to an ascii string.

constraint.display: Value must be greater than zero or empty

property.description: This value defines the size of animation pool from which animation information structures can be dynamically allocated and returned.

constraint.display: Value must be greater than zero or empty

property.description: Enables the mouse support. This definition should only be enabled when a mouse (not a touch screen) must be supported.
When enabled, the GUIX display driver utilizes hardware mouse cursor drawing support.
Enables font kerning support.
To eliminate runtime overhead and library footprint increase, say yes if you do not require alpha-blending drawing support.
This value defines the maximum length of a string, which is used to test invalid strings.

constraint.display: Value must be greater than zero or empty

config.content: #if (${config.el.gx_src.stack_size}+0) #define GX_THREAD_STACK_SIZE (${config.el.gx_src.stack_size}+0) #endif #if (${config.el.gx_src.system_timer_ms}+0) #define GX_SYSTEM_TIMER_MS (${config.el.gx_src.system_timer_ms}+0) #endif #if (${config.el.gx_src.system_timer_ticks}+0) #define GX_SYSTEM_TIMER_TICKS (${config.el.gx_src.system_timer_ticks}+0) #endif #if (${config.el.gx_src.disable_multithread_support}) #define GUIX_DISABLE_MULTITHREAD_SUPPORT #endif #if (${config.el.gx_src.disable_utf8_support}) #define GX_DISABLE_UTF8_SUPPORT #endif #if (${config.el.gx_src.max_queue_events}+0) #define GX_MAX_QUEUE_EVENTS (${config.el.gx_src.max_queue_events}+0) #endif #define GX_SYSTEM_THREAD_PRIORITY (${config.el.gx_src.thread_priority}+0) #define GX_SYSTEM_THREAD_TIMESLICE (${config.el.gx_src.thread_time_slice}+0) #if (${config.el.gx_src.widget_user_data}) #define GX_WIDGET_USER_DATA #endif #if (${config.el.gx_src.disable_arc_drawing_support}) #define GX_DISABLE_ARC_DRAWING_SUPPORT #endif #if (${config.el.gx_src.disable_software_decoder_support}) #define GX_DISABLE_SOFTWARE_DECODER_SUPPORT #endif #if (${config.el.gx_src.disable_binary_resource_support}) #define GX_DISABLE_BINARY_RESOURCE_SUPPORT #endif #if (${config.el.gx_src.repeat_button_initial_tics}+0) #define GX_REPEAT_BUTTON_INITIAL_TICS (${config.el.gx_src.repeat_button_initial_tics}+0) #endif #if (${config.el.gx_src.max_dirty_areas}+0) #define GX_MAX_DIRTY_AREAS (${config.el.gx_src.max_dirty_areas}+0) #endif #if (${config.el.gx_src.max_context_nesting}+0) #define GX_MAX_CONTEXT_NESTING (${config.el.gx_src.max_context_nesting}+0) #endif #if (${config.el.gx_src.max_input_capture_nesting}+0) #define GX_MAX_INPUT_CAPTURE_NESTING (${config.el.gx_src.max_input_capture_nesting}+0) #endif #if (${config.el.gx_src.cursor_blink_interval}+0) #define GX_CURSOR_BLINK_INTERVAL (${config.el.gx_src.cursor_blink_interval}+0) #endif #if (${config.el.gx_src.multi_line_index_cache_size}+0) #define GX_MULTI_LINE_INDEX_CACHE_SIZE (${config.el.gx_src.multi_line_index_cache_size}+0) #endif #if (${config.el.gx_src.multi_line_text_button_max_lines}+0) #define GX_MULTI_LINE_TEXT_BUTTON_MAX_LINES (${config.el.gx_src.multi_line_text_button_max_lines}+0) #endif #if (${config.el.gx_src.polygon_max_edge_num}+0) #define GX_POLYGON_MAX_EDGE_NUM (${config.el.gx_src.polygon_max_edge_num}+0) #endif #if (${config.el.gx_src.numeric_scroll_wheel_string_buffer_size}+0) #define GX_NUMERIC_SCROLL_WHEEL_STRING_BUFFER_SIZE (${config.el.gx_src.numeric_scroll_wheel_string_buffer_size}+0) #endif #if (${config.el.gx_src.circular_gauge_animation_delay}+0) #define GX_DEFAULT_CIRCULAR_GAUGE_ANIMATION_DELAY (${config.el.gx_src.circular_gauge_animation_delay}+0) #endif #if (${config.el.gx_src.numeric_prompt_buffer_size}+0) #define GX_NUMERIC_PROMPT_BUFFER_SIZE (${config.el.gx_src.numeric_prompt_buffer_size}+0) #endif #if (${config.el.gx_src.animation_pool_size}+0) #define GX_ANIMATION_POOL_SIZE (${config.el.gx_src.animation_pool_size}+0) #endif #if (${config.el.gx_src.mouse_support}) #define GX_MOUSE_SUPPORT #endif #if (${config.el.gx_src.hardware_mouse_support}) #define GX_HARDWARE_MOUSE_SUPPORT #endif #if (${config.el.gx_src.font_kerning_support}) #define GX_FONT_KERNING_SUPPORT #endif #if (${config.el.gx_src.disable_brush_alpha_support}) #define GX_DISABLE_BRUSH_ALPHA_SUPPORT #endif #if (${config.el.gx_src.max_string_length}+0) #define GX_MAX_STRING_LENGTH (${config.el.gx_src.max_string_length}+0) #endif

constraint.display: Refer to release notes if multiple symbol definition linkage error occurs
GX_MOUSE and GX_HARDWARE_MOUSE cannot be enabled at the same time
